name: A Very Pilkington Christmas
storyline:
Alrite? It’s Christmas 1985, and thirteen-year-old Karl has his heart set on finally getting a Sinclair ZX Spectrum... but he’s going to have to earn it. Help the little young manc fella on his quest to have an unforgettable Christmas.

This 2D pixel art adventure game is chock-full of references and classic Pilky moments. In addition to the main story, there are also optional Bucket List tasks to be completed throughout the game. Completing all tasks will unlock some special content that you won’t want to miss.

Oh, and have a good Christmas.

Disclaimer: This is a free-to-play fan game and must not be sold or redistributed. This game is not affiliated with Karl in any way.
summary: 2D pixel art fan game for Karl Pilkington.
